select p.id, p.name, p.police_code, p.phone, p.dept_code, u.unitname as deptName from police_info p left join unit_info u on p.dept_code = u.id and u.delete_status=0 where p.delete_status=0
and p.name like concat('%', #{param.name}, '%')
and p.police_code like concat('%', #{param.policeCode}, '%')
and p.phone like concat('%', #{param.phone}, '%')
order by p.create_time desc
